main.title: AI-supercharged Language Exchange
main.description:
Discover a vibrant, feed-based community where you can share posts, follow friends, and learn languages beyond basic greetings. Our AI-powered features make language exchange fun and easy.
Just start Loqu now!

collection.title: Information Collection
collection.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including your name, email address, and profile information when you create an account. We also collect information about your language learning preferences and interactions within the app.

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, to communicate with you, and to personalize your experience. This includes using your data to enhance our AI-powered features and language learning algorithms.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can also opt out of certain data collection and use. Contact us if you have any questions about your privacy rights.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@loqu.xyz

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using Loqu, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you disagree with any part of the terms, you may not access the service.

description.title: Description of Service
description.content: Loqu is a language exchange platform that connects users for language learning and cultural exchange. We provide AI-powered features to enhance the language learning experience.

userResponsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.content: Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account information and for all activities that occur under their account. Users must comply with all applicable laws and regulations.

content.title: User Content
content.content: Users retain ownership of their content but grant Loqu a license to use, modify, and distribute the content within the service. Users are responsible for ensuring they have the rights to share their content.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend access to our service immediately, without prior notice, for any breach of these Terms of Service.

respect.title: Respect
items: Be kind and respectful to all community members
Avoid offensive language and discriminatory content
Respect cultural differences and diverse perspectives
Listen actively and be open to learning from others

inclusivity.title: Inclusivity
items: Welcome members from all backgrounds and skill levels
Create an environment where everyone feels comfortable participating
Support and encourage fellow language learners

safety.title: Safety
items: Use the platform's reporting features when necessary
